name: Hyperspace Racing
description:
This is a small racing game with a first person perspective - you are sitting inside the cabin of car. Drive around the area, visit various locations, race against cosmic squid-like critter and flying car near the mesmerizing green hyperspace anomaly.

Controls: W,S - back and forth
A,D - turning
Q,E - Up and down ; F1,F2 - faster and slower
Esc - exit
Created by: 

JovanJovan (registered as some_name) ⇒     managing, coding, 3D models, level design, sounds and more

MainCharacter (good and helping guy) ⇒    3D models and level design and little coding

Gray car model from Kenney assets, we added  turbines, edited interior for game. 

Free Unity assets were used (materials, table asset, menu code), and free textures from opengameart.com

It's a free project
